description: The Warhammer Community website has undergone a major redesign, introducing a new look and several enhanced features. Launched yesterday September 26, the update aims to improve user experience while maintaining the same wide range of content that Warhammer fans have come to expect. The updated site now features an improved categorization system. Articles are organized...
title: Warhammer Community Launches Redesigned Website

description: Micro Mycelium is a newly launched tile-placement strategy game that combines fast-paced gameplay with strategic depth. Designed for 1-4 players. Players take on the role of different mushroom types, strategically placing tiles to grow and defend their fungal territories. The core gameplay revolves around placing tiles from a player’s market to the field and replenishing...
title: Micro Mycelium: A New Tile-Placement Strategy Game Now on Kickstarter

description: Josh Lee Kwai, a well-known figure in the Magic: The Gathering community and CEO of The Command Zone YouTube channel, announced his resignation from the Commander Advisory Group (CAG) on September 25th. Kwai stated via social media that he hoped to have contributed positively to the Commander format during his tenure, but his departure follows...
title: Josh Lee Kwai Resigns from Commander Advisory Group Following Recent Bans
